    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void chooseHiddenPlayerCard()
      Displays text to tell the other user that they are required to select a card to show the current user

      Clears all components wihtin the Canvas.

      Displays text that ensures the other player is ready to pick a card from their possible cards

      Displays text to inform the user that they are in control of the computer again

      Displays the text instructing the user to create a user name

      Displays the rules of the game for the user.

      Displays text that asks the user how many players there are

      Displays the title screen
      void noSuggestions()
      Displays text to inform the user there was no user that could refute their suggestion

      Renders all cells within the board.

      Instructs the player to select a character

      Sets title Text of the Canvas.

      Displays all the cards, highlighting cards in red that the player has not seen
      void showHand()
      Displays the current players hand
      void showUserOtherPlayerCard()
      Displays text to show the user what card the other user has shown them to refute their suggestion
